original: A little hunk of glop that fell off a blob monster.  It doesn't seem hostile, but it does wiggle occasionally.
translation: 一个变形怪身上掉下的糊状物，似乎已经没有了敌意，但偶尔会蠕动几下。
context:
ID: slime_scrap
位于 /Kenan-Structured-Modpack/M_Blazemod_Extension/blaze_override.json
类型为 COMESTIBLE

WIKI:
https://onetwo.ren/CDDA-Kenan-Modpack-Chinese/#M_Blazemod_Extension→COMESTIBLE→slime_scrap
物品浏览器：
http://cdda.aloxaf.cn/search?q=slime_scrap

original: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  Instead of calcifying large amounts of calcified teeth, it has instead calcified a single large blade-like mass; which it uses defensively and offensively.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.
translation: A living blob turned into an autonomous weapon.  Instead of calcifying large amounts of calcified teeth, it has instead calcified a single large blade-like mass; which it uses defensively and offensively.  The amorphous mass can be shaped and attached at your touch, but the weapon itself is inert without something to control it.

original: A rock the size of your fist.  It is covered with intricate spirals; it is impossible to tell whether they are carved, naturally formed, or some kind of fossil.
translation: 拳头般大小的岩石。有着复杂的螺旋图形，你也不知道它是雕刻的，还是自然形成的，亦或是某种化石。

original: A smaller crystal that fell off the diamond obelisk upon creation.  Through some unknown mechanism, is able to link with the obelisk to fire a small, yet still powerful laser.  Even more perplexing is its ability to do so without guidance.
translation: A smaller crystal that fell off the diamond obelisk upon creation.  Through some unknown mechanism, is able to link with the obelisk to fire a small, yet still powerful laser.  Even more perplexing is its ability to do so without guidance.

original: A sparkling diamond with a dazzling spiral pattern.  Small pieces of glittering crystal form on the edges as you hold it.  With enough base material, applying it to objects causes organic matter, wood in particular, to rapidly transform into diamond. However, this new crystalline compound quickly disintegrates without some other form of support.
translation: A sparkling diamond with a dazzling spiral pattern.  Small pieces of glittering crystal form on the edges as you hold it.  With enough base material, applying it to objects causes organic matter, wood in particular, to rapidly transform into diamond. However, this new crystalline compound quickly disintegrates without some other form of support.

original: A tall tower composed almost entirely of diamond, the cluster of diamond matrices focuses the energy from an array of solar panels into a terribly powerful laser.  It is also capable of storing energy from the sun and can fire even in the dark.

original: This is a stone with spirals all over it, and holes around its perimeter.  Though it is fairly large, it weighs next to nothing.  Air seems to gather around it.
